posts.name: Dell Streak 7
posts.snippet: Introducing Dell™ Streak 7. Share photos, videos and movies together. It’s small enough to carry around, big enough to gather around.

posts.name: Samsung Gem™
posts.snippet: The Samsung Gem™ brings you everything that you would expect and more from a touch display smart phone – more apps, more features and a more affordable price.

posts.name: Dell Venue
posts.snippet: The Dell Venue; Your Personal Express Lane to Everything

posts.name: Nexus S
posts.snippet: Fast just got faster with Nexus S. A pure Google experience, Nexus S is the first phone to run Gingerbread (Android 2.3), the fastest version of Android yet.

posts.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab™
posts.snippet: Feel Free to Tab™. The Samsung Galaxy Tab™ brings you an ultra-mobile entertainment experience through its 7” display, high-power processor and Adobe® Flash® Player compatibility.

posts.name: Samsung Showcase™ a Galaxy S™ phone
posts.snippet: The Samsung Showcase™ delivers a cinema quality experience like you’ve never seen before. Its innovative 4” touch display technology provides rich picture brilliance, even outdoors

posts.name: DROID™ 2 Global by Motorola
